title: Generative Pre-trained Transformer 4 (GPT-4) in clinical settings
details: V Bellini, EG Bignami - The Lancet Digital Health, 2025
abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) is progressing at an extra ordinary rate, driving substantial advances in various domains, including health care. As technology evolves, it is creating unprecedented opportunities to develop tools that can support and enhance …

title: Ensemble Multi-task Learning Approach for Explainable EEG-Based Stroke Prediction
details: S Nbili, S Bouazizi, H Ltifi - International Conference on Pattern Recognition, 2024
abstract: Stroke is a major cause of long-term disability. Early and accurate diagnosis of stroke severity can improve patient outcomes. EEG is a non-invasive way to analyze brain activity changes during stroke, but interpreting complex EEG data remains …
